Plot: Two famous competitive climbers make a bet on who can climb Cerro Torre, one of the most dangerous mountains in Argentina and the world, first. As the day of the climb approaches, their increasing competitiveness becomes destructive.
Title: Scream of Stone
Writer: Hans-Ulrich Klenner, Walter Saxer, Robert Geoffrion (english dialogue), Reinhold Messner (original idea)
Actors: Vittorio Mezzogiorno, Stefan Glowacz, Mathilda May, Al Waxman
